Title: Requires school districts to conduct mandatory early screening for dyslexia for all children
Summary: Requires school districts to conduct mandatory early screening for dyslexia for all children commencing in pre-kindergarten or kindergarten and continuing thereafter on an annual basis until each child successfully completes second grade; requires school districts to designate an individual to maintain complete and accurate records containing early screening reports for each child, and to provide resources and materials to the parent and/or guardian of any child who displays indications of dyslexia.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to mandatory early screening for dyslexia
